description: vLLM -> recommended setuptools & torch mapping for installer automation (maintainers update as needed)

0.14.1.notes: CPU-safe baseline; works on macOS arm64 and CPU-only Linux

0.15.1.notes: Requires CUDA 12.8 driver; use nightly index on GB10/Blackwell (CUDA >= 13)

auto.notes: Let vllm pull in its preferred torch; only pre-pin setuptools if needed
